reports_summary: From a single write-up, the game feels smooth on the Steam Deck OLED when run with an enforced 45 FPS cap and FSR2 quality upscaling, delivering steady midâ€‘40s frame rates after a lengthy first launch of roughly five minutes. Once in play we saw few drops and stable behaviour through demanding scenes, though that initial load and a couple of graphical adjustments are needed to maintain the balance. Power draw sits at about 18 W, so expect battery life in the region of two to three hours using these settings.
